mapper.update: update hallseat set sectionId = #{sectionid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sectionName = #{sectionname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, columnId = #{columnid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, columnNo = #{columnno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rowId = #{rowid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rowNo = #{rowno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cinemaId = #{cinemaid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, hallId = #{hallid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updateTime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where seatNo = #{seatno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select seatNo, sectionId, sectionName, columnId, columnNo, rowId, rowNo, status, cinemaId, hallId, createTime, updateTime from hallseat where seatNo = #{seatno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
